summary: Professional in visual, user interface (UI) and instructional design for mobile applications, websites, and platform designs supporting the financial services, consumer goods, life science, biotech, and bio-pharmaceuticals industries. User-centered web & mobile expertise is infused with a broader design sensibility that comes from prior experience in other media: product design, 3D design, illustration, and even furniture design. The result is great user interaction and excellent designs that drives acquisition and retention rates up.
